global_caption: a scene featuring a man wearing a white short-sleeve shirt and beige pants, wearing sunglasses and holding a paper map in his right hand, with his foot in the frame of the image; a woman in a sky-blue dress, wearing brown sandals, with her left hand on her side, taking a picture of the sky with a camera, and holding a brown hat; a female wearing a top with a flower pattern and short jeans, holding a gray suitcase in her right hand and a coffee cup in her left hand; and a man wearing a light green T-shirt, beige shorts, and black shoes, with his hands in his pockets; all set against a background featuring yellow buildings and white street lamps.
